text: Rupert Davies (22 May 191622 November 1976) was a British actor. He is best known for playing the title role in the BBC's 1960s television adaptation of Maigret, based on Georges Simenon's Maigret novels. Davies was born in Liverpool. He died in London from cancer, aged 60. ==Other websites== * * *Rupert Davies's appearance on This Is Your Life Category:1916 births Category:1976 deaths Category:Actors from Liverpool Category:Cancer deaths in London Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors
title: Rupert Davies
